Our underlying third-party peer provider has identified the issue as being caused by an industry-wide incident affecting multiple upstream providers.

incidents.name: GoToConnect - Delays with MMS

incident_updates.body:
On 06/28/2022, from approximately 09:30 PM UTC until 06/29/2022 at 12:10 AM UTC, a subset of GoToConnect customers may have experienced delays with MMS, SMS was being delivered normally.

We have confirmed that the issue has been resolved completely and all systems are 100% operational at this time.

We will conduct an internal investigation of this issue and make appropriate improvements to our systems to help prevent or minimize future recurrence.
